entry.title: [FR-1][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 15, 18:00 - 23:00 UTC

Nov 14, 12:32 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Manager] - Web Hosting/CDN/Databases statistics
entry.content:
Nov 9, 11:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 7, 15:54 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/11/2023 11:00 UTC
End time : 30/12/2024 14:07 UTC
Service impact :
1 - CDN statistics won't be available in the manager. You can access your data on the OVHcloud Web Statistics page to help you track and manage your website traffic.

2 - Web Hosting and Databses statistics won't be available in the manager during the periods indicated below:
The first cuts will take place on :
• 6 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Done
• 9 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Rescheduled
• 13 Nov 2023: 12h - 13h CET - Done
• 23 Nov 2023: 12h - 15h CET
• 30 Nov 2023: 14h - 15h CET
• 4 Dec 2023: 14h - 15h CET
• 5 Dec 2023: 12h - 17h CET
• 12 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET
• 14 Dec 2023: 14h - 16h CET
• 15 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET
• 18 Dec 2023: 12h - 16h CET
• 19 Dec 2023: 10h - 17h CET

Permanent shutdown on 20/12/2023 for a few months.

Not impacted metrics for Databases are: "Shared", "Disk space consumption" and "Logs".
Not impacted metric for Web Hosting is: "Disk space consumed".

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a migration to our Manager Database which might have an impact on Web Hosting, CDN, Databases metrics in the manager.
